word_mean: 不省人事的，意识丧失的：对感官的刺激不起反应，没有主观意识
无意识的，潜意识的：不能以通常的方法进入意识的那部分精神活动，但是它的存在可以在症状形成、梦中或是药物的影响下表现出来。这是Freud的精神分析模型系统之一。参见conscious和preconscious

sentence.Network_en: Beneath the conscious mind there are many levels of the unconscious.
sentence.Network_cn: 在意识心理之下存在很多层次的无意识。

sentence.Network_en: "You're well out of it," Christopher said with unconscious brutality.
sentence.Network_cn: “幸亏没你什么事儿，”克里斯托弗无意中冷冷地说道。

sentence.Network_en: Unconscious envy manifests itself very often as this kind of arrogance.
sentence.Network_cn: 潜意识里的嫉妒常表现为这种傲慢自大。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 潜意识（unconscious）又称无意识，则是在意识和前意识之下受到压抑的没有被意识到的心理活动，代表着人类更深层、更隐秘、更 …
2.无意识（unconscious）又称潜意识，是不能被人意识到的心理层面，正常人的大部分心理活动是在无意识中进行，并受无意识驱动 …
My Best Friend’s Wedding_在线英语听力室 ... ) delusion 错觉 ) unconscious 无意识的 ) psychosomatic 受心理影响的.
高中必背3500词汇表听写版 - 豆丁网 ... unconditional a. 无条件，绝对的 unconscious a. 昏迷,不省人事的 underground a. 地下的.

list.abs: 心理学专业英语词汇(U) ... unconscious phantasy 潜意识幻想 unconscious process 潜意识过程 unconscious selection 无意识选择.
...是相互作用的系统所构成，即：意识我（ego）、个体无意识（personal unconscious）和集体无意识（collective unconscious）。
unconditioned stimulus 无条件剌激unconscious selection 无意识淘汰uncoupling 解偶联
...是一个归纳的过程，是从特殊的影像推断其所表达的一般客体和事件类别。由于这种过程处于你的意识觉知以外，故赫尔姆霍兹把它称为无意识推理(unconscious inference)。当特殊境况允许对同一种刺激有多重解释，或者当要求做出新的解释而观察者却仍喜好旧的、熟悉的解释时，错.

entry.tran: 不省人事的；失去知觉的；神志不清的
entry.def: Someone who is unconscious is in a state similar to sleep, usually as the result of a serious injury or a lack of oxygen.

example.ex: By the time ambulancemen arrived he was unconscious...
example.tran: 救护人员到达时他已经不省人事了。

example.ex: He was dragged from his van and beaten unconscious by a gang of salmon poachers.
example.tran: 他被一帮盗猎大麻哈鱼的家伙从货车里拽出来打得不省人事。

entry.tran: 不知道的；未觉察的；没注意到的
entry.def: If you are unconscious of something, you are unaware of it.

example.ex: He himself seemed totally unconscious of his failure...
example.tran: 他本人似乎对自己的失败全然不知。

example.ex: Mr Battersby was apparently quite unconscious of their presence.
example.tran: 巴特斯比先生显然没有注意到他们在场。

entry.def: If feelings or attitudes are unconscious, you are not aware that you have them, but they show in the way that you behave.

example.ex: Unconscious envy manifests itself very often as this kind of arrogance...
example.tran: 潜意识里的嫉妒常表现为这种傲慢自大。

example.ex: 'You're well out of it,' Christopher said with unconscious brutality.
example.tran: “幸亏没你什么事儿，”克里斯托弗无意中冷冷地说道。

entry.def: Your unconscious is the part of your mind that contains feelings and ideas that you do not know about or cannot control.

example.ex: In examining the content of the unconscious, Freud called into question some deeply-held beliefs.
example.tran: 在审视无意识的内容时，弗洛伊德对一些根深蒂固的看法提出了质疑。

means.word_mean: 1. that part of the mind wherein psychic activity takes place of which the person is unaware
1. not conscious; lacking awareness and the capacity for sensory perception as if asleep or dead;

sentences.sentence: "happily unconscious of the new calamity at home"- Charles Dickens

auth_sentence.content: He saw the Unconscious...as a receptacle for repressed material.
auth_sentence.res_content: He saw the Unconscious...as a receptacle for repressed material.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He saw the Unconscious...as a receptacle for repressed material.

auth_sentence.content: Psychoanalysis...can gain access to the contents of the Unconscious.
auth_sentence.res_content: Psychoanalysis...can gain access to the contents of the Unconscious.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Psychoanalysis...can gain access to the contents of the Unconscious.

auth_sentence.content: The stream of the unconscious continues to flow undisturbed.
auth_sentence.res_content: The stream of the unconscious continues to flow undisturbed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The stream of the unconscious continues to flow undisturbed.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 审慎正直的,认真的,本着良心的
stems_affixes.word_buile: con全部+sci知道+entious多……的→知道关心的多→有责任,认真的

stems_affixes.value_cn: [of]意识到的,自觉的;神志清醒的

stems_affixes.word_buile: ne不+scient[adj.有知识的, 有技巧的]→adj.无知的;没有知识的
omni到处+scient知道的→adj.无所示在的
pre预先+sci知道+ent……的→预先知道的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有知识的, 有技巧的
stems_affixes.word_buile: sci知道+ent……的→adj.有知识的, 有技巧的
sci知道+ent+ific表形容词→adj.科学上的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不省人事, 未发觉的, 无意识的
stems_affixes.word_buile: un不+conscious意识到的→adj.不省人事, 未发觉的, 无意识的
sub下面+conscious意识到的→在意识之下→潜意识的
con全部+sci知道+ence表名词→全部知道→良知,良心
pre预先+sci知道+ence表名词→预先知道
scient[adj.有知识的, 有技巧的]+ist专家或人→n.科学家

means.word_mean: 失去知觉的; 无知觉的; 昏迷的; 不省人事的

sentences.en: He knelt down beside the unconsicious girl.
sentences.cn: 他跪在那个失去知觉的女孩身边。

means.word_mean: 无意识地做出或说出的; 感情、思想等自然流露的

sentences.en: We all indulge in unconscious role-playing.
sentences.cn: 我们大家都无意识地沉耽于角色扮演之中。
